00052   bool file_check(std::string const &file, mode_t mask = S_IFMT) {
00053     struct stat st;
00054     return 0==stat(file.c_str(), &st) && (mask&st.st_mode);
00055   }
00068   std::string short_name(std::string const &file_name) {
00069     size_t slash = file_name.find_last_of('/');
00070     
00071     if( std::string::npos!=slash )
00072       return std::string(file_name, slash+1);
00073     return file_name;
00074   }

00094 std::string LogManager::locate(std::string const &file, bool &found) const {
00095   if( file.empty() )
00096     found = false;
00097   else {
00098     found = file_check(file);
00099     if( !found && '/'!=file[0] ) {
00100       std::list<std::string>::const_iterator i = m_searchPath.begin();
00101       for(; m_searchPath.end()!=i; ++i ) {
00102        std::string loc = *i+'/'+file;
00103        found = file_check(loc);
00104        if( found )
00105          return loc;
00106       }
00107     }
00108   }
00109   return file;
00110 }
00111 
00112 bool LogManager::addSearchPath(std::string const &path) {
00113   if( !path.empty() ) {
00114     if( '.'==path[0] || file_check(path, S_IFDIR) ) {
00115       // This is a directory -> add it to the path
00116       m_searchPath.push_back(path);
00117       return true;
00118     }
00119   }
00120   return false;
00121 }
00122 
00123 void LogManager::loadSearchPath() {
00124   char *home = getenv(TREX_ENV);
00125   if( NULL!=home ) {
00126     std::string home_path(home);
00127     // Right now I am adding $TREX_HOME as it is
00128     // In  the future I may have to add $TREX_HOME/extra
00129     // -- or whatever I decide -- instead
00130     addSearchPath(home_path);
00131   }
00132   char *path = getenv(SEARCH_ENV);
00133   if( NULL!=path ) {
00134     // column separated list
00135     std::string path_str(path);
00136     static boost::char_delimiters_separator<char> sep(false, "", ":");
00137     boost::tokenizer<> tok(path_str, sep);
00138     for(boost::tokenizer<>::iterator beg=tok.begin(); beg!=tok.end();++beg) {
00139       addSearchPath(*beg);
00140     }
00141   }
00142 }
00143 
00144 std::string const &LogManager::logPath() {
00145   SharedVar<bool>::scoped_lock lock(m_inited);
00146 
00147   if( !*m_inited ) {
00148     if( m_path.empty() ) {
00149       createLatest();
00150     } else if( !file_check(m_path) ) { 
00151       int ret = mkdir(m_path.c_str(), 0777);
00152       if( 0==ret ) {
00153        throw ErrnoExcept("LogManager: Unable to create log directory :");
00154       }
00155     }
00156     std::string cfg = m_path+"/cfg";
00157     int ret = mkdir(cfg.c_str(), 0777);
00158     if( 0!=ret && EEXIST!=errno )
00159       throw ErrnoExcept("LogManager: error while creating cfg dir");
00160     m_syslog.open(m_path+'/'+TREX_LOG_FILE);
00161     m_syslog<<"TREX version "<<TREX::version::str();
00162     loadSearchPath();
00163     *m_inited = true;
00164   }
00165   return m_path;
00166 }
00167 
00168 void LogManager::createLatest() {
00169   char *base_dir = getenv(LOG_DIR_ENV);
00170   char dated_dir[17];
00171   
00172   if( NULL==base_dir ) {
00173     throw ErrnoExcept("LogManager: $"LOG_DIR_ENV" is not set");
00174   }
00175   dated_dir[16] = '\0';
00176 
00177   time_t cur_time;
00178   time(&cur_time);
00179   strftime(dated_dir, 16, "/%Y.%j.", gmtime(&cur_time));
00180   
00181   std::string latest = base_dir;
00182   std::string cur_basis = base_dir;
00183   size_t len = latest.length()+30;
00184   char *buf = new char[len+1];
00185   std::memset(buf, 0, len+1);
00186   latest = latest+'/'+LATEST_DIR;
00187   cur_basis += dated_dir;
00188   int ret = readlink(latest.c_str(), buf, len-1);
00189   size_t last = 0;
00190   if( ret>0 ) {
00191     // latest link exists and point to something
00192     size_t b_len = cur_basis.length();
00193     if( 0==cur_basis.compare(0, b_len, buf, b_len) ) {
00194       std::istringstream iss(std::string(buf, b_len));
00195       iss>>last;
00196     }
00197     unlink(latest.c_str());
00198   }
00199   delete[] buf;
00200   for(unsigned i=1; i<MAX_LOG_ATTEMPT; ++i) {
00201     std::ostringstream oss;
00202     oss<<cur_basis<<std::setw(2)<<std::setfill('0')<<(last+i);
00203     int ret = mkdir(oss.str().c_str(), 0777);
00204     if( 0==ret ) {
00205       m_path = oss.str();
00206       symlink(m_path.c_str(), latest.c_str());
00207       return;
00208     } else if( EEXIST!=errno )
00209       throw ErrnoExcept("LogManager: error while trying to create log dir");
00210   }
00211   throw ErrnoExcept("LogManager", "Too many attempts ... clean up your "
00212                   "log directory");
00213 }

00215 std::string LogManager::file_name(std::string const &short_name) {
00216   return logPath()+'/'+short_name;
00217 }

00219 std::string LogManager::getCfgPath() {
00220   return file_name("cfg/");
00221 }
00222 
00223 std::string LogManager::use(std::string const &file_name, bool &found) {
00224   std::string dest_name = getCfgPath()+short_name(file_name);
00225 
00226   std::string located = locate(file_name, found);
00227   if( found ) {
00228     std::ifstream src(located.c_str(), std::ios::binary);
00229   
00230     if( !!src ) {
00231       syslog()<<"- Using file "<<located;
00232       std::ofstream dest(dest_name.c_str(), std::ios::binary);
00233 
00234       dest<<src.rdbuf();
00235       src.close();
00236       dest.close();
00237     } else
00238       throw ErrnoExcept("File \""+located+'\"');
00239   }
00240   return located;
00241 }

00248   return m_syslog<<('['+txt+"] ");

00251 bool LogManager::setLogLevel(LogLevel lvl) {
00252   SharedVar<bool>::scoped_lock guard(m_inited);
00253   if( !*m_inited ) {
00254     m_level = lvl;
00255     return true;
00256   }
00257   syslog("LogManager")<<"Cannot change verbosity level after init."<<std::endl;
00258   return false;
00259 }

00261 bool LogManager::setLogPath(std::string const &path) {
00262   SharedVar<bool>::scoped_lock guard(m_inited);
00263   if( !*m_inited ) {
00264     m_path = path;
00265     return true;
00266   }
00267   syslog("LogManager")<<"Cannot change log path after init."<<std::endl;
00268   return false;
00269 }
